programme.desc: Mike Epps, Richard Pryor Jr. and others recount the culture-defining influence of Richard Pryor - one of America's most brilliant, iconic comic minds - in this new documentary. Directed by Emmy®-winning filmmaker Marina Zenovich and executive produced by Roy Ackerman and Pryor's widow, Jennifer Pryor(n)

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy(n)

programme.title: Star Trek V: The Final Frontier
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Captain Kirk and his crew must deal with Spock's long-lost half-brother who hijacks the Enterprise for an obsessive search for God at the center of the galaxy. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy(n)

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons(n)

programme.title: IVERSON
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary charting the rise of basketball great Allen Iverson, told largely in his own words. From a turbulent childhood of crushing poverty in Virginia to controversial run-ins with the law to iconic Philadelphia 76ers all star, his audacious rejection of convention and off the court embrace of hip-hop sent shockwaves through the NBA and influenced an entire generation(n)

programme.title: Miami Vice
programme.desc: Jamie Foxx and Colin Farrell star as undercover detectives who get involved in a case of drug trafficking and murder in South Florida that takes a personal turn(n)

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan(n)

programme.title: Twin Peaks: Fire Walk With Me
programme.desc: In a town where nothing is as it seems - and everyone has something to hide - this prequel to the television drama series chronicles the seven days leading up to the brutal murder of Laura Palmer in a small logging town in the Pacific Northwest. Written and directed by David Lynch and starring Kyle MacLachlan, Sheryl Lee, Heather Graham, David Bowie, Chris Isaak, Harry Dean Stanton, Kiefer Sutherland and more

programme.title: Walter
programme.desc: In this quirky comedy, a ticket taker at the local cinema believes he is the son of God and must decide on the eternal fate of everyone he comes in contact with. Stars William H. Macy and Neve Campbell

programme.title: The Atticus Institute
programme.desc: Mockumentary horror set in a 1960s paranormal research institute, where a new female subject displays demonic prowess. But when the US government steps in to weaponize her abilities, there are disastrous consequences

programme.title: The Wraith
programme.desc: Charlie Sheen stars in this eerie sci-fi drama about a gang of car thieves menaced by a mysterious black turbo racing car that seems literally hell-bent on avenging the death of a young teenager. Nick Cassavetes, Sherilyn Fenn, Griffin O'Neal and Randy Quaid costar in this cult classic, a late-night television favorite

programme.title: Refuge
programme.desc: Post-apocalyptic thriller set in the ruins of a collapsed America where a family struggles to survive and rebuild a life in the wake of a catastrophic plague that has wiped out most of the surrounding civilization. When they take in an injured young man, it may threaten everything they have

programme.title: Reaper
programme.desc: When a death row inmate survives his execution and returns as a supernatural, unholy creature, a mysterious community of drifters and criminals must band together to defeat the monster or perish in the depths of hell

programme.title: Seventh Moon
programme.desc: American newlyweds honeymooning in China discover a legendary ancient custom that comes back to haunt them in a remote village

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town

programme.title: Star Kid
programme.desc: A dorky seventh grader who spends his days avoiding the class bully and dreaming of becoming a comic book hero gets to try on the superpower he's always wanted when an extraterrestrial spacecraft crashes on earth

programme.title: The Final Cut
programme.desc: Robin Williams is a Cutter, a futuristic editor who shapes the digitally recorded memories of the dead into narratives that can be watched by their bereaved loved ones - but one new batch of memories contains horrible crimes committed by a wealthy and powerful client. Mira Sorvino and James Caviezel costar in this science fiction drama from writer/director Omar Naim

programme.title: Shriek If You Know What I Did Last Friday the Thirteenth
programme.desc: This wacky satire of teen horror spoofs every convention of its vapid genre with broadly funny style, following the efforts of a high school principal (Coolio) and a TV reporter (Tiffani Amber Thiessen) to uncover the truth about a series of slayings on campus. Tom Arnold, Shirley Jones and Jimmie Walker costar in this delightfully absurd lampoon

programme.title: The Bleeding
programme.desc: Returning from duty in Afghanistan, a combat veteran (Michael Matthias) is dismayed to discover that his parents are dead and that his own brother has become a vampire king of the nosferatu. There's only thing for a red-blooded American hero to do: enlist the aid of a highly unusual priest (Michael Madsen) and go to war against his own sibling. Armand Assante costars in this fun, action-packed horror romp

programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead

Andrew Cymek, John Rhys-Davies and William B. Davis star in this horror thriller(n)

programme.desc: When a beach-front encounter with a zombie during their honeymoon results in a groom with a taste for human flesh, a newlywed bride tries to make the best of a rapidly deteriorating situation in this romantic horror comedy starring Tracy Coogan and Graham Sibley(n)

programme.desc: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse for a group of friends when they visit a remote archaeological dig in the jungle and are quickly entangled in a brutal struggle for survival against the evils hidden within. Stars Jena Malone(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan

programme.desc: An engaged couple goes away with their friends to a remote cabin to celebrate their upcoming wedding but the weekend takes a horrifying turn when dark secrets and forbidden desires are revealed and what started as a celebration quickly descends into a bloody nightmare

programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room

programme.desc: No-holds barred stand-up comedian Godfrey performs a riotous set in his hometown of Chicago

programme.title: Safelight
programme.desc: A high-school student tries to help a troubled runaway escape from the clutches of her psychotic pimp by taking a road trip along the California coastline. Stars Juno Temple and Evan Peters

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: Cas & Dylan
programme.desc: When a terminally ill doctor reluctantly agrees to give a young woman who is an aspiring writer and social misfit a ride home, the pair end up on a cross country journey that opens their eyes to life's most important lessons. Directed by Jason Priestley

programme.title: The Cookout
programme.desc: After he signs a $30 million NBA contract, number-one draft pick Todd Anderson (Storm P) decides to celebrate by inviting his many friends and family to his luxurious mansion for a big cookout - a raucous party that doesn't go over so well with his snooty neighbor the judge (Danny Glover) or his gated community's overly alert security guard (Queen Latifah). Eve, Ja Rule, Farrah Fawcett, Tim Meadows and Jonathan Silverman co-star in this "Barbershop"-style comedy, based on a story by Latifah, who also served as executive producer

programme.title: Sister
programme.desc: After the death of his father, a young man whose life is falling apart, returns to his hometown to take care of his mentally ill sister, and tries to save her, while also saving himself

programme.desc: The death of one of their own reunites a group of lifelong friends who have gone their separate ways. Back together for the first time since high school, they hash out their pasts and confront what pulled them apart

programme.title: Bloodsucking Bastards
programme.desc: Horror comedy about a dutiful employee at a soul-crushing corporation who finds out that his new boss has promoted a vampire, who is destroying the office one body at a time

programme.title: The Death of "Superman Lives": What Happened?
programme.desc: A documentary that delves into the almost making of Hollywood movie "Superman Lives". In 1996, Warner Brothers hired director Tim Burton to assemble an elite group of artists, including Nicolas Cage as the titular hero, and what follows is "never quite made it" movie history(c)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

programme.title: Life of a King

programme.title: The D Train
programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. programme.desc: The dorky head of a high school reunion committee (Jack Black) travels to Los Angeles to track down the most popular guy from his graduating class and convince him to go to the reunion, in an obsessive pursuit of approval and recognition that takes over his life. programme.title: Meskada
programme.desc: After a home burglary results in the murder of a young boy, a small town detective is called in to solve the case, one that has galvanized an entire community around the victim's politically powerful mother. Nick Stahl, Rachel Nichols and Kellan Lutz star in this crime thriller(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl(n)

programme.title: Song One
programme.desc: Oscar winner® Anne Hathaway stars as a woman whose musician brother is left in a coma following a car accident, leading her to seek out his idols and finding herself falling for an unlikely match in this romantic drama set against the backdrop of Brooklyn's vibrant indie music scene(n)

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship(n)

programme.title: After
programme.desc: When two bus crash survivors awake to discover that they are the only people left in their small town, they must form an unlikely alliance in a race to unravel the truth behind their isolation, as a dark fog concealing danger advances towards the town(n)

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer(n)

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost(n)

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson(n)

programme.title: The Lucky Ones
programme.desc: Three Iraq War veterans embark on a stateside road trip full of startling revelations and emotional catharsis in this comedy drama starring Tim Robbins, Michael Pena and Rachel McAdams(n)

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: No Escape
programme.desc: An international thriller starring Owen Wilson as an American businessman who resettles his family to a new home in Southeast Asia, where they unwittingly find themselves in the middle of a violent political uprising. Co-stars Pierce Brosnan(n)

programme.title: The Man Who Knew Infinity
programme.desc: Dev Patel stars in this story of the life and academic career of the pioneer Indian mathematician, Srinivasa Ramanujan, who leaves his home country and his young bride to travel to Trinity College in England in 1931 and despite his brilliance and the help of an eccentric mentor, must fight to prove himself and his theories to the establishment. Co-stars Jeremy Irons

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice

programme.title: Shaquille O'Neal Presents: All Star Comedy Jam: Live From Sin City
programme.desc: Comedian and actor Lavell Crawford (Breaking Bad) hosts this installment of Shaquille O'Neal's All Star Comedy Jam franchise in Las Vegas, featuring comedy veteran Earthquake who teams up with Cocoa Brown, K-Dubb, and Donell Rawlings to deliver a hilarious night of comedy

programme.title: Legend of the Fist: The Return of Chen Zhen
programme.desc: A legendary Chinese hero, believed dead, returns to Shanghai in disguise and uses nefarious tactics to infiltrate a criminal empire and employs his martial arts skills to seek justice

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: From legendary filmmaker Steven Spielberg comes an epic film that chronicles the untold story of the final four months of the man regarded as America's greatest President. Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as the commander-in-chief of a country in chaos: a man with moral courage and a progressive thinker who challenged the status quo. Featuring an all-star cast including Sally Field, Tommy Lee Jones and James Spader

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: 45 Years
programme.desc: In an Academy Award® nominated role, Charlotte Rampling stars as a woman who finds out on her 45th wedding anniversary that her husband was once engaged to someone else

programme.title: The Beach Boys: Making Pet Sounds
programme.desc: Celebrating the 50th anniversary of the release of ‘Pet Sounds,' Brian Wilson and surviving members of The Beach Boys (Mike Love, Al Jardine, Bruce Johnston and David Marks) revisit the writing and recording of the landmark record that is consistently voted one of the top three influential albums of all time. Featuring exclusive interviews, classic archive and rare studio outtakes from the recording sessions

programme.title: Mother's Day
programme.desc: Legendary filmmaker Garry Marshall directs an all-star cast including Jennifer Aniston, Kate Hudson, Julia Roberts and Jason Sudeikis in this romantic comedy about a group of strong, loving and wildly imperfect women who are about to prove the power of the maternal bond

programme.title: Lincoln
programme.desc: From legendary filmmaker Steven Spielberg comes an epic film that chronicles the untold story of the final four months of the man regarded as America's greatest President. Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis stars as the commander-in-chief of a country in chaos: a man with moral courage and a progressive thinker who challenged the status quo. Featuring an all-star cast including Sally Field, Tommy Lee Jones and James Spader

programme.title: A Bronx Tale
programme.desc: A young man comes of age in an Italian-American neighborhood in the Bronx, guided by conflicting influences: his straight-arrow father (Robert De Niro) and the local mafia boss (Chazz Palminteri)

programme.title: Enemy At The Gates
programme.desc: Joseph Fiennes and Jude Law star in this riveting account of the 1942-43 Battle of Stalingrad from the Russian point of view. Talented sharpshooter Vassili is a rural youth who becomes a national hero by almost single-handedly holding back the German assault. That is, until the Nazis send a gifted gunslinger of their own to the besieged city, his sole mission to assassinate Vassili

credits.writer: Graphic Violence, Adult Content, Adult Language, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Requiem For A Dream
programme.desc: Gritty, intense drama from director Darren Aronofsky ("Pi") that concerns the drug abuse of New York heroin users Harry (Jared Leto) and Tyrone (Marlon Wayans), as well as Harry's diet pill-addicted mother Sara (Oscar nominee Ellen Burstyn). As his world becomes increasingly focused on scoring, Harry drags his beautiful girlfriend Marion (Jennifer Connelly) down with him, leading to a harrowing finale. Chris McDonald, Louise Lasser and Keith David costar in this stylishly directed tragedy based on the novel by Hubert Selby Jr

programme.title: SXSW Comedy with Natasha Leggero Part 2
programme.desc: Actress and comedian Natasha Leggero hosts an all-star lineup of the most hilarious minds in comedy, including Emo Phillips, Sean Patton, Ian Edwards, Kurt Braunohler and Eliza Skinner

programme.title: My Best Friend's Girl
programme.desc: A vulgar womanizer offers himself to jilted men as a "rebound guy" who will send their ex-lovers running back into their arms, but meets his match in the brassy former girlfriend of his best buddy. Dane Cook, Kate Hudson and Jason Biggs star in this romantic comedy

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: Dean Smith
programme.desc: Coach, mentor, social activist ...the life and legacy of Dean Smith, North Carolina's legendary basketball coach - who went to 11 Finals Fours and won two National Championships, with players like Michael Jordan, James Worthy, Vince Carter and Jerry Stackhouse - is remembered and celebrated by former players and colleagues

programme.title: Last Knights
programme.desc: Morgan Freeman and Clive Owen star in this sword-clashing adventure of a fallen warrior who rises against a corrupt and sadistic ruler to avenge his dishonored master

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan

programme.title: I Love You Phillip Morris
programme.desc: The improbably true story of a charismatic conman's journey from small-town businessman to flamboyant white-collar criminal, who repeatedly finds himself on the lam, brilliantly escaping from prison on four separate occasions - all in the name of love. Starring Jim Carrey, Ewan McGregor and Leslie Mann

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: American Jihad
programme.desc: Documentary probe into the phenomenon of home-grown Jihadism, analyzing the strategic outreach and tactics employed by terrorists in order to reach susceptible members of society and what can be done to prevent it. Featuring intimate stories from former Jihadists radicalized to commit violent acts of terrorism and their families and communities caught in the crosshairs

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.title: America's Sweethearts
programme.desc: For an awkward, self-conscious girl like Kiki (Julia Roberts), being the personal assistant to a beautiful megastar like Gwen (Catherine Zeta-Jones) is no bowl of cherries. But when she reluctantly accepts the task of helping Gwen and her estranged husband (John Cusack) make it through one last public appearance - masterminded by legendary press agent Lee Phillips (Billy Crystal) - Kiki finds her job satisfaction plummeting

programme.title: Tyler Perry's The Family That Preys
programme.desc: Alfre Woodard and Kathy Bates are the matriarchs of two completely different families, one white, the other black; one rich, the other working class, who become best friends despite the odds against them in this comedy-drama costarring Sanaa Lathan(n)

programme.title: Steve Byrne: Tell The Damn Joke
programme.desc: He's a comic. A husband. A dad. An American. And on top of it all, he's hilarious. Steve Byrne brings his signature style to Chicago with an all-new comedy special that holds no punches, calls it like it is and tells the damn jokes(n)

programme.title: Carousel of Sex
programme.desc: After falling for a handsome philanthropist, a working woman, who lives life to the fullest, fantasizes about a new life. Will she run away or will her voluptuous rival steal her happiness away?(n)

programme.title: High School
programme.desc: The day after valedictorian Henry Burke (Matt Bush) tries marijuana for the first time, his school principal (Michael Chiklis) institutes mandatory drug tests for all students. Henry has two options: fail and lose his college scholarship, or team up with his stoner friend Travis (Sean Marquette) to beat the system. After all, if everyone fails the drug test, then no one will be expelled, right? Adrien Brody co-stars in this pot comedy(n)

programme.title: Man About Town (2006)
programme.desc: The life of an unscrupulous Hollywood talent agent (Ben Affleck) comes unraveled when he learns that his beautiful wife has been having an affair with his top client, then loses his highly detailed and personal journal to an ambitious reporter. Rebecca Romijn, Bai Ling and John Cleese costar in this comedy-drama from writer/director Mike Binder ("Reign Over Me")(n)

programme.title: Who Framed Roger Rabbit
programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Like Sunday, Like Rain
programme.desc: A 12-year-old rich kid cello prodigy wants for nothing but the attention of his absent parents until a young musician is hired as his au pair and an unexpected friendship blossoms. Stars Leighton Meester and Debra Messing(n)

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film(n)

programme.title: Body
programme.desc: After three twenty-something girls break into a mansion and inadvertently murder the groundskeeper, they slowly self-destruct as they decide what to do with the dead body in the living room(n)

programme.title: Cry Freedom
programme.desc: Sweeping epic set in apartheid-era South Africa about white journalist Donald Woods (Kevin Kline), who is forced to flee the country after attempting to investigate the death of black activist Stephen Biko (Denzel Washington)(n)

programme.title: Out of the Furnace
programme.desc: When Rodney Baze (Casey Affleck) mysteriously disappears and law enforcement doesn't follow through fast enough, his older brother, Russell (Christian Bale), takes matters into his own hands to seek justice(n)

programme.title: Beyond the Sea
programme.desc: Kevin Spacey directs, stars in and does all his own singing for this lavish biography of music legend Bobby Darin, whose life and career is followed from the childhood illness that weakened his heart to the heights of fame as a crooner and movie star. Kate Bosworth costars as Darin's wife Sandra Dee along with John Goodman, Greta Scacchi, Bob Hoskins and Brenda Blethyn(n)

programme.title: Tears of the Sun
programme.desc: Bruce Willis stars as a hard-bitten Navy S.E.A.L, who is sent into the heart of Africa and finds himself in conflict when he has to choose between following orders or the dictates of his conscience

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars

programme.title: Bad Company (1995)
programme.desc: An icy new recruit (Laurence Fishburne) at a shadowy paramilitary outfit is making the company's normally unflappable co-owner (Ellen Barkin) very nervous in this crime thriller costarring Frank Langella, Michael Beach, Gia Carides, David Ogden Stiers and Daniel Hugh Kelly

programme.title: Sexipede
programme.desc: A doctor tries to prove an unknown creature materializes inside human bodies during sex by romping with her until she can capture it

programme.title: Battle Royale
programme.desc: In the future, the Japanese government captures a class of ninth-grade students, and places them on a on a desert island where they are forced to fight each other to death or all of them will be killed

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: Male Gigolo
programme.desc: Rob Schneider stars as an average aquarium cleaner who house-sits for a gigolo - only to be forced to become one himself

programme.title: The Forger
programme.desc: John Travolta stars as an art forger who arranges an early release from prison so he can spend time with his dying son but is then forced to pull off one final audacious heist. Also stars Christopher Plummer

programme.title: Shaun of the Dead
programme.desc: Shaun (Simon Pegg) and his friends are in for a literal night from hell when they meet up at the local pub only to find themselves fighting off hordes of brain-hungry undead. Penelope Wilton, Kate Ashfield, Lucy Davis and Bill Nighy co-star in this zombie-fraught romantic comedy

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship

programme.title: Prison Fighters: 5 Rounds to Freedom
programme.desc: A SHOWTIME feature-length documentary following two men in Thailand's modern day Prison Fight program, where convicted criminals are given the chance to fight for their release - and possible redemption, too - through the ancient tradition of Muay Thai matches

programme.title: IVERSON
programme.desc: Feature-length documentary charting the rise of basketball great Allen Iverson, told largely in his own words. From a turbulent childhood of crushing poverty in Virginia to controversial run-ins with the law to iconic Philadelphia 76ers all star, his audacious rejection of convention and off the court embrace of hip-hop sent shockwaves through the NBA and influenced an entire generation

programme.title: Bangkok Dangerous (2008)
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars in this remake of the action classic about a lethal assassin who travels to Bangkok to perform a quartet of hits but falls in love with a beautiful, deaf pharmacist, and takes a young hustler under his wing as a protege. Charlie Yeung costars in this stylish thriller

programme.title: X-Rated 2: The Greatest Adult Stars of All Time
programme.desc: Documentary sequel that offers a close-up look into the personal lives of the legendary porn stars who've survived the test of time and influenced popular culture. Blends rare interviews with erotic clips and additional appearances by Whoopi Goldberg, Steven Soderbergh and a host of adult stars, directors and trendsetters

programme.title: Nick Cannon: Stand Up, Don't Shoot
programme.desc: Comedian Nick Cannon is back - and using his potent voice to attack the haters and naysayers, while discussing everything from the controversial times we're living in to how getting old affects his dating. Plus, there's Nick's scoop on how a trip to Australia was the straw that broke his marriage to Mariah Carey's back. Filmed live at the Ebony Repertory Theatre in South Central Los Angles

programme.title: Martin Lawrence: Doin' Time: Uncut
programme.desc: Comedy legend Martin Lawrence returns to the stand-up stage for a night of impressions and insight on everything from sex, relationships and President Obama, to Bill Cosby, Hollywood and more. Filmed live at LA's Orpheum Theatre

programme.title: The Spirit
programme.desc: A classic comics character inspired this gritty, hard-boiled thriller about a slain cop (Gabriel Macht) whose ghost returns to his hometown to defeat a corrupt, murderous villain called The Octopus (Samuel L. Jackson). Eva Mendes costars in this visually dazzling adaptation

programme.title: Stolen
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage stars as a former thief who has just 12 hours to come up with $10 million after his former partner kidnaps his daughter

programme.title: Zero Days
programme.desc: Documentary from Oscar-winning filmmaker Alex Gibney that explores the phenomenon of Stuxnet, a self-replicating computer virus discovered in 2010 that was allegedly commissioned by the US and Israeli governments to sabotage Iran's nuclear program that opened up a Pandora's box of cyber warfare

programme.title: Chappie
programme.desc: In the near future, crime is patrolled by a mechanized police force and when a police droid is stolen and given new programming, he becomes the first robot with the ability to think and feel for himself but a powerful, destructive force sees him as a danger to mankind and will stop at nothing to destroy him. Stars Hugh Jackman, Sigourney Weaver and Dev Patel

programme.title: Larry the Cable Guy: Health Inspector
programme.desc: Larry has his life turned upside-down when he's saddled with a rookie partner and assigned to investigate an outbreak of mysterious food poisonings at the city's swankiest restaurants. Infuriating restaurateurs with his bad manners, Larry nevertheless manages to charm a sweet, shy waitress into a budding romance. But when unorthodox methods cost him his health inspector job, Larry has to go undercover to bring the conspirators to justice

programme.title: American Heart
programme.desc: For most of us, the notion of living on the streets is little more than food for thought. But for a homeless father (Jeff Bridges) and his teenage son (Edward Furlong), it's a cold, hard fact of life. Director Martin Bell first explored life in the not-so-great outdoors with his 1984 documentary "Streetwise," an unforgettable look at the day-to-day tragedy of Seattle's street teens. With this eye-opening drama, he looks at this avoidable human catastrophe from a somewhat different perspective. Featuring music by Tom Waits

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Well-meaning retired cop Pally (Kiefer Sutherland) is only trying to help out his stepbrother Ray (Anthony LaPaglia) when he agrees to bankroll a long-shot racehorse. But a big-time Mob figure (Daniel Benzali) also has an interest in the animal and before you can say "conflict of interest," Pally and Ray are mired in business with some very shady figures. Lothaire Bluteau and Radha Mitchell costar in this superb crime drama from writer/director Mark Malone ("Dead of Winter," "Hoods")

programme.title: Double Whammy
programme.desc: Wry comedy from writer/director Tom DiCillo ("Living in Oblivion") stars Denis Leary as Ray, a widowed New York cop on disability leave since his botched handling of a fast food restaurant hold-up led to a bad back and bad PR. As Ray begins to shed his "loser" self-image with help from a pretty chiropractor (Elizabeth Hurley), some residents of his apartment building - including the vengeful, spoiled daughter of his super (Luis Guzman) and a pair of devious screenwriters - hatch dangerous schemes. Steve Buscemi and Donald Faison costar

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

programme.title: ShoBox: The New Generation: 4/14/2017
programme.desc: The critically acclaimed SHOWTIME boxing series, "ShoBox: The New Generation" returns with a slate of undefeated prospects determined to fight for a world title, featuring light heavyweight Dmitry Bivol (9-0, 7 KOs), super bantamweight Glenn Dezurn (8-0, 6 KOs) and welterweight Malik Hawkins (10-0, 7 KOs) in separate bouts(n)

programme.title: Mr. Brooks
programme.desc: Kevin Costner stars in this unusual psychological thriller as Earl Brooks, a doting husband and father, a successful businessman, and an award-winning philanthropist. Earl is beloved by his family and community, so nobody suspects that he is also a notorious, deranged serial killer who is under pressure from a zealously determined female detective (Demi Moore) and a sleazy photographer (Dane Cook) with evidence of his crimes. Marg Helgenberger and William Hurt costar(n)

programme.title: Lost Highway
programme.desc: Bill Pullman plays Fred Madison, a man who begins receiving disturbing video tapes of him and his wife (Patricia Arquette) sleeping. When the final tape shows Fred murdering his wife he is sent off to death row. Here Fred inexplicably becomes young Pete Dayton (Balthazar Getty), who leads a completely different life. Ultimately, the two identities begin to cross paths in this surreal, suspenseful web of intrigue from director David Lynch(n)

programme.title: Organic Foods
programme.desc: Penn and Teller examine the organic food industry to determine if it is, as many claim, more nutritious, and better for the environment(n)

programme.title: F/X
programme.desc: Bryan Brown stars as a special-effects expert for low-budget Hollywood movies who his hired to fake the assassination of a gangster who wants to avoid testifying against his former mob bosses. Co-stars Jerry Orbach and Brian Dennehy(n)

programme.title: A Murder in the Park
programme.desc: Documentary glimpse into a very broken criminal justice system as nearly 16 years after his confession exonerated a death row inmate and sparked the end of the death penalty in Illinois, Alstory Simon languishes in prison serving a 37-year sentence over a confession he claims was coerced(n)

programme.title: Pele: Birth of a Legend
programme.desc: Biographical drama telling the miraculous story of Pelé, the legendary soccer player who rose to fame from the slums of Sao Paulo to lead Brazil to its first ever World Cup victory in 1958 at the age of 17(n)

programme.title: Perfect in '76
programme.desc: SHOWTIME documentary revisiting the ‘76 Hoosiers and renowned coach Bobby Knight, who led his Indiana team to a perfect 32-0 season and a national championship(n)

programme.title: The Seven Five
programme.desc: Documentary that goes inside the minds of the crooked cops who brazenly started their own criminal empire in East New York during the crack cocaine explosion of the late 80s and early 90s, lead by "the dirtiest cop ever" Michael Dowd. Packed with interviews with those who broke the law and those who protected it, in what turned out to be the biggest police corruption scandal in New York City history(n)

programme.title: Deja Vu
programme.desc: After a ferry is bombed in New Orleans, an ATF agent joins a unique investigation using experimental surveillance technology to find the bomber - but finds himself becoming obsessed with one of the victims. Denzel Washington stars(n)

programme.title: The Yards
programme.desc: Released from prison after taking the fall for a group of his friends, Leo Handler (Mark Wahlberg) just wants to get his life on track. But when he takes a job with his powerfully influential Uncle Frank (James Caan) and reconnects with his old friend Willie (Joaquin Phoenix), Leo finds himself unwittingly drawn into a world of sabotage, high-stakes payoffs and murder. Featuring Charlize Theron, Faye Dunaway and Ellen Burstyn(n)

programme.title: Good Kill
programme.desc: A Las Vegas-based drone pilot fights the Taliban by remote control for 12 hours a day, then goes home to the suburbs and feuds with his wife and kids for the other 12. But he is starting to question his mission. Is he creating more terrorists than he's killing and will the war ever end? Stars Ethan Hawke and January Jones(n)

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a man stumbles upon a bloody crime scene, a pickup truck loaded with heroin and two million dollars in cash, his decision to take the money and run ignites an unstoppable chain reaction of violence and mayhem in writer/director Joel and Ethan Coen's Academy Award winning thriller. Starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin(n)

programme.title: Rocky Balboa
programme.desc: When a cable channel runs a computer boxing simulation that predicts an in-his-prime Rocky Balboa would win a fight against the current heavyweight champion, the aging, retired Balboa - now a widowed Philadelphia restaurant owner - begins considering a very late-career comeback. Sylvester Stallone stars in, writes, and directs this charming final installment in the "Rocky" saga, costarring Milo Ventimiglia, Geraldine Hughes, Burt Young and Antonio Tarver

programme.desc: Toon star Roger is worried that his wife Jessica is playing pattycake with someone else, so the studio hires detective Eddie Valiant to snoop on her. But when Marvin Acme turns up dead Roger becomes the prime suspect

programme.title: Helicopter Mom
programme.desc: A teenage boy must come to terms with his overbearing, meddling mother, who involves herself in every aspect of his life from prom to submitting him for an LGBT scholarship because she thinks he might be gay

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill

programme.title: The Accidental Spy
programme.desc: Jackie Chan stars in this globe-trotting adventure as a sporting goods salesman whose dream of being an international spy comes true when he foils a bank robbery and is recruited to search for a missing person in Korea, where he uncovers a plot involving a hidden fortune and a stolen weapon of mass destruction. Eric Tsang and Vivian Hsu costar

programme.title: Christmas Eve
programme.desc: In this all-star family comedy, a power outage traps six groups of New Yorkers in elevators on Christmas Eve where they find that laughter, romance and a little bit of faith might get them through – and change their lives in unexpected ways. Stars Patrick Stewart and Jon Heder

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Behold the Monkey
programme.desc: A well-intentioned pensioner restores a fresco in a small Spanish town

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: The Muppet Movie
programme.desc: Kermit the Frog - along with Fozzie Bear, Miss Piggy, Gonzo and a motley crew of Muppets - embarks on a cross-country trip to find fame in Hollywood while eluding the grasp of a relentless frog-leg restauranteur

programme.title: Mighty Joe Young
programme.desc: The beautiful daughter (Charlize Theron) of a slain scientist raises a rare two-ton mountain gorilla in the jungles of Africa, but allows a safari leader (Bill Paxton) to bring the giant beast to Los Angeles in order to save him from a poacher who is obsessed with capturing the mythical creature. Regina King costars in this family fantasy, a modern-day remake of the 1949 classic

programme.title: Miss Potter
programme.desc: Renee Zellweger stars in this biography of "Peter Rabbit" author Beatrix Potter, an artist stuck in a Victorian, turn-of-the-century era when young women are expected to find suitable husbands, not spend hours writing and illustrating children's stories about bunnies. Frustrated at her efforts to publish her work and find a suitable mate, Potter is shocked when to find both in the same person: a publisher (Ewan McGregor) who takes her and her work seriously. Emily Watson costars in this sweetly charming film

programme.title: Rescue Dogs
programme.desc: Family adventure set on a beach in sunny southern California, in which a restaurant owner enlists his rescue dog to take on an evil businessman and finds time to fall for a beautiful dancer

programme.title: Walking on Sunshine
programme.desc: Love, sun, lust and 80s hit songs collide in this musical romantic comedy set on the stunning coast of Italy, where a young woman is on the precipice of marrying her gorgeous fiancé, not knowing he had a fling with her sister

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world

programme.title: Rugrats In Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Finsters and the Pickles travel to the City of Lights, where Chucky hopes that his dad Chas will find him a new mother while he repairs the malfunctioning reptiles at a European dinosaur theme park. Based on the beloved Nickelodeon series, this animated family adventure features the voices of Christine Cavanaugh, Elizabeth Daily, Susan Sarandon, Michael Bell, Cheryl Chase, John Lithgow, Debbie Reynolds, Mako, Casey Kasem and Tim Curry

programme.title: Ping Pong Summer
programme.desc: In this coming of age comedy, a family vacation during the summer of 1985 changes everything for a shy teenage boy obsessed with ping pong

programme.title: Against the Tide
programme.desc: A Showtime Sports chronicle of the seminal 1970 college football matchup between Alabama's Crimson Tide and USC Trojans at Birmingham's Legion Field. Through interviews with former Alabama legends Joe Namath, John Mitchell and USC stars Sam "Bam" Cunningham, Jimmy Jones and more, this documentary examines coach Paul "Bear" Bryant's surprising decision to bring a dominant, racially integrated football team onto the field in Birmingham for the very first time and reveals the impact college football played in the struggle for integration(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Scenarios USA Shorts: House Not Home
programme.desc: A gender fluid teenager navigates bullying and violence from peers and rejection from a parent on the journey out of the closet. Directed by Joshua Butler and written by teen Skyler Edge(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star(n)

programme.title: All-Stars
programme.desc: Comedy about a veteran softball coach, who is saddled with a team of inexperienced 10-year-old girls and their overly ambitious, delusional parents(n)

programme.title: I Am Giant: Victor Cruz
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Victor Cruz's improbable rise to football stardom, the life shattering injury that derailed his career and his dramatic attempt at a comeback, revealing the man behind the mask, as he faces the biggest challenge of his life(n)

programme.title: Inspector Gadget
programme.desc: A security guard's dreams come true when he is selected to be transformed into a cybernetic police officer. Matthew Broderick and Rupert Everett star(n)

programme.title: Open Your Eyes
programme.desc: A handsome Don Juan finds his life a living nightmare in Alejandro Amenabar's intriguing Spanish genre-bender, which mixes science fiction, horror and psychological thriller. No sooner has Cesar (Eduardo Noriega) met the woman of his dreams (Peneope Cruz), than a jilted ex (Najwa Nimri) decides to wreak her revenge. Alas, that's only the beginning of Cesar's problems. Be prepared for a wild and twisty ride in this sexy and challenging philosophical puzzlebox. Later remade as "Vanilla Sky," in which Cruz reprised her costarring role

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Premonition (2007)
programme.desc: The world of a suburban wife and mother (Sandra Bullock) is shattered when her husband is killed in a car accident. But reality soon begins warping, bouncing her through time before and after his death - and giving her a chance to change her family's fate. Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller

programme.title: The Ruins
programme.desc: A leisurely Mexican holiday takes a turn for the worse for a group of friends when they visit a remote archaeological dig in the jungle and are quickly entangled in a brutal struggle for survival against the evils hidden within. Stars Jena Malone

programme.title: Dressed to Kill
programme.desc: A mysterious blonde woman kills a frustrated housewife and then goes after the high-class call girl who witnessed the murder. Stars Michael Caine, Nancy Allen and David Margulies. Directed by Brian De Palma

programme.title: Black Filmmaker Showcase: Secrets Kept
programme.desc: A man returns to his childhood church hoping to rid himself of a long-held secret in this short from filmmaker Charles Nuckolls

programme.title: Girl on the Edge
programme.desc: A troubled teenager who falls victim to an online predator is sent to an experimental treatment center to recover from the trauma, where she fights the demons of the past with the help of her new friends and a rescued horse

programme.title: Who Gets the Dog?
programme.desc: After deciding to call their marriage quits, Olive (Alicia Silverstone) and Clay (Ryan Kwanten) both want custody of their beloved dog Wesley. programme.title: Good Advice

programme.title: Big Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by the iconic Tim Burton, this tale is based on the outrageous true story of one of the most epic art frauds in history, which stars Amy Adams as an artist who creates enigmatic paintings of waifs with big eyes, which are appropriated by her husband as his own work, catapulting him to unearned fame

programme.title: Ginger & Rosa
programme.desc: Two inseparable teenage girls growing up in 1960s London as the Cuban Missile Crisis looms explore friendship, activism and budding desire and encounter a pivotal event that will redefine their friendship. Stars Elle Fanning, Annette Bening and Oliver Platt

programme.title: The Ex
programme.desc: After his baby son is born, chronic underachiever Tom Reilly (Zach Braff) is suddenly forced to grow up and take a job working in his father-in-law's advertising agency after his wife Sofia (Amanda Peet) elects to leave her career as a lawyer. One little wrinkle: Sofia's seemingly perfect, wheelchair-bound ex-boyfriend (Jason Bateman) also works for the same company, and immediately sets about undermining Tom at every turn. Charles Grodin, Mia Farrow and Donal Logue costar in this comedy cult favorite

Julian McMahon, Nia Long, Kate Nelligan, Peter Stormare and Amber Valletta costar in this mind-bending thriller(n)

programme.title: Coffee and Cigarettes
programme.desc: Bill Murray, Cate Blanchett, Steve Buscemi, Iggy Pop, Jack and Meg White, Tom Waits, Steven Wright and Roberto Benigni are part of the eccentric cast appearing in this series of 11 wry, short films by filmmaker Jim Jarmusch, shot over a period of 17 years. Linking this lyrical and leisurely collection of black-and-white vignettes is the ubiquitous presence of a cup of joe and a ciggie, some great background music (often heard from diner jukeboxes) and an inextinguishable sense of cool. "Plays like a haunting concept album" - "Rolling Stone."(n)

programme.title: Harvey
programme.desc: Adaptation of the Pulitzer Prize-winning play by Mary Chase about Elwood P. Dowd, a tippler with an invisible rabbit friend

programme.title: The Rabbit Trap
programme.desc: Tale of a seemingly minor family crisis that changes a man's life. Ernest Borgnine, Kevin Corcoran, Bethel Leslie, June Blair, David Brian. J.P. Miller adapted his TV play. Thoughtful, dramatic. Philip Leacock directed

programme.title: Night of the Lepus
programme.desc: Monstrous man-eating rabbits terrorize an Arizona community

programme.title: The Hound and the Rabbit
programme.desc: A frisky dog chases down a young bunny, but only wants to be friends with the little guy, who takes him to meet his pals, where the dog becomes their protector against a wily fox. (cc)

programme.title: Death Watch
programme.desc: In the near future, a woman with an incurable disease is befriended by a reporter whose eye has been replaced with a video camera in order to secretly dramatize her illness on a reality TV show

programme.title: Booked for Safekeeping
programme.desc: Police-training film demonstrates how to handle cases involving mentally ill people. Shot in New Orleans, the film used actual city police recruits. Among the scenarios: a senile elderly woman causes a scene at a store; a depressed man attempts suicide by leaping from a bridge; and a catatonic man turns violent

programme.title: The Silver Chalice
programme.desc: Paul Newman made his film debut in this adaptation of Thomas B. Costain's best seller about a Greek sculptor who was sold into slavery and later charged with creating a receptacle for the Holy Grail

programme.title: Godspell
programme.desc: An adaptation of the Broadway hit traces the life of Jesus Christ as he communes with an energetic melting pot of 20th-century New Yorkers who rhapsodize through the streets and enact gospel parables that climax with the Last Supper and his crucifixion

programme.title: The Set-Up
programme.desc: Exposé of corruption in the boxing world, with a fine performance by Robert Ryan as a “washed-up” prizefighter. Alan Baxter, Audrey Totter. Tiny: George Tobias. Gus: Wallace Ford. Penetrating characterizations, excellent cast, realistic atmosphere. Robert Wise directed

programme.title: Barabbas
programme.desc: Biblical epic about the thief in whose place Christ was crucified, and how the guilt-ridden criminal went on to experience life as a laborer, a gladiator and finally a witness to the burning of Rome

programme.title: Ben-Hur
programme.desc: The Biblical epic re-creates the Nativity, the Crucifixion and a thundering chariot race as it recounts the tale of Jewish prince Judah Ben-Hur, who lives in Judea with his family during the time that Jesus Christ was becoming known for his teachings. The film won 11 Oscars, including Best Picture, Actor (Charlton Heston) and Director (William Wyler). (cc)

programme.title: Easter Parade
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning score that features 17 Irving Berlin songs drives this romp about a hoofer who tries to mold a singer into a Broadway star. To play the song-and-dance man, Fred Astaire came out of retirement and stepped in after MGM's original choice, Gene Kelly, broke an ankle prior to filming. (cc)

programme.title: The Robe
programme.desc: A Roman tribune assigned by Pontius Pilate to supervise the crucifixion of Christ wins Christ's garments in a dice game, resulting in a profound change in the formerly self-indulgent soldier

programme.title: King of Kings
programme.desc: New Testament epic telling of the life of Jesus Christ, the court of Herod the Great and the political intrigues of Barabbas

programme.title: Ben-Hur A Tale of the Christ
programme.desc: The silent epic about the Judean prince who is befriended and then betrayed by a Roman centurion features a memorable sea battle and climaxes in a classic chariot race. Remade in 1959

programme.title: Meantime

programme.title: The Hunt for the Lost Ark
programme.desc: Exploring the history and religious significance of the Israelites' Ark of the Covenant, a chest built at Moses' behest (and first mentioned in the Bible in Exodus 25:16). It is said to contain testimony of God's pact with the Jews and the tablets holding the Ten Commandments. Solomon placed the Ark in the Temple at Jerusalem (1 Kings 8:6-9), but it has been missing since the Babylonians destroyed the temple in 586 B.C. This hour includes speculation as to what might have happened to it. (repeat) (cc)

programme.title: 100 złotych
programme.desc: Zestawienie klipów, które w ciągu ostatnich kilku lat najbardziej namieszały w show-biznesie. Zaproszeni do studia goście komentują zaprezentowane w rankingu utwory. Program jest dynamicznie zmontowany, a widz czasami ma wrażenie, że goście prowadzą ze sobą dialog. Ich wypowiedzi przeplatane są fragmentami piosenek. Klipy są także prezentowane jako tło blueboxowe bądź jako element scenografii

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju i ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw informacji, które mają lub mogą mieć wpływ na ich życie. Najważniejszy punkt odniesienia w serwisie stanowi człowiek. Reporterzy skupiają się głównie na tematach, których brakuje obecnie w serwisach informacyjnych. Program przygotowują znani dziennikarze, m.in. Beata Tadla, Joanna Dunikowska, Marek Czyż, Jarosław Kulczycki i Tomasz Sekielski

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Teraz Ja!
programme.desc: Tomasz Sekielski prezentuje informacje o wydarzeniach, które wywierają realny wpływ na codzienne życie. Wraz z zaproszonymi do studia gośćmi omówi najważniejsze doniesienia z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie także reporterskich relacji czy dziennikarskich prowokacji

programme.title: Party Mix
programme.desc: Weekendowe pasmo muzyczne, w którym jego twórcy zaprezentują starannie wyselekcjonowany zbiór utworów w sam raz na taneczny, imprezowy wieczór. Widzowie usłyszą przeboje, które cieszą się największą popularnością w różnych częściach świata. Nie zabraknie najsłynniejszych hitów artystów polskich i gwiazd z zagranicy

programme.title: Godzina z...
programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego(n)

programme.desc: Nowatorski program skierowany do miłośników muzyki oraz DIY. Klipy przeplatają się tu z krótkimi filmikami zawierającymi porady dotyczące codziennych czynności - od majsterkowania, przez gotowanie po make up. Tematyka porad jest bardzo bogata i różnorodna. Dzięki nim, widzowie dowiedzą się m.in. tego, jak przygotować peeling z cukru lub kawy, jak przyrządzić domowe chipsy czy wykonać żyrandol ze szklanej butelki. Efekt końcowy zaskoczy każdego(n)

programme.title: Po prostu gotuj! z Rachel Allen
programme.sub-title: Po prostu gotuj! z Rachel Allen (odc. 10)
programme.desc: Jeśli codzienne gotowanie spędza ci sen z powiek, gdyż cierpisz na brak czasu i czujesz się ograniczony przez domowy budżet, ten program jest dla ciebie. Prowadząca prezentuje przepisy, które zadowolą każdego, kto nie chce spędzać długich godzin w kuchni, a przy tym wydawać fortuny. Co więcej, efekty przechodzą najśmielsze oczekiwania. Rachel umiejętnie przekazuje wiedzę, jak wyczarować w kuchni prawdziwe kulinarne perełki bez wysiłku, lecz wzbudzając zachwyt domowników(n)

programme.title: Sala operacyjna
programme.desc: 40-letni ksiądz Marcin to klasyczny przypadek osoby uzależnionej od jedzenia. Wiele razy podejmował próbę walki z otyłością. Niestety, obżarstwo zawsze wygrywało ze zdrowym rozsądkiem. Pierwszą operację zmniejszenia żołądka przeszedł parę lat temu. Zrzucił wtedy kilkadziesiąt kilogramów. Odzyskał kondycję i sprawność fizyczną. Szansę jednak na normalne życie stracił na własne życzenie. Powoli przyzwyczajał żołądek do chorobliwego objadania się, co doprowadziło do jeszcze większej nadwagi. Marcin zdecydował się na kolejną operację. Za jakiś czas również wrócił do nałogu jedzenia. Podjął trzecia próbę. Kamera towarzyszy Marcinowi i lekarzom podczas przygotowań i samej operacji zmniejszenia żołądka(n)

programme.title: Trinny i Susannah ubierają Danię
programme.desc: Brytyjskie ekspertki stylu Trinny Woodall i Susannah Constantine podróżują po całym świecie, pomagając zaniedbanym kobietom przeobrazić się w ikony stylu. Znawczynie kobiecej mody uczą panie, jak dobrze wyglądać. Ich misją jest wpojenie zasad dobrego stylu i rozsądnego podążania za modą. W tej serii Trinny i Susannah oceniają styl Dunek. W każdym odcinku spotykają się z kobietami o różnych modowych upodobaniach oraz gustach. Doradzają im oraz pomagają dobrać buty, dodatki, stroje odpowiednie dla ich sylwetki, typu urody i stylu życia. Specjalistki współpracują z doskonałymi fryzjerami, wizażystami i projektantami, by zmienić zwykłe kobiety w prawdziwe modelki(n)

programme.title: Żony za kółkiem
programme.desc: Kobieta za kierownicą stała się bohaterką wielu dowcipów, a w brzydkiej części użytkowników dróg w najlepszym wypadku budzi uśmiech politowania. W programie panie, które niezbyt dobrze radzą sobie z prowadzeniem auta zasiądą na miejscu kierowcy. Pasażerami, a jednocześnie instruktorami będą... ich partnerzy. Każda para będzie miała trzy dni na uzupełnienie braków i dogłębne poznanie techniki jazdy samochodem. Nie zawsze będzie różowo - widzowie będą świadkami wybuchów złości, łez porażki i słownych potyczek. Trudy nauki wydobędą bowiem z bohaterów prawdziwe uczucia, które żywią oni swoich połówek. Ale na tym nie koniec. Każda para przejdzie dodatkowo test końcowy. Uczestnicy, którzy najlepiej poradzą sobie z zadaniem wyjadą z programu z atrakcyjną nagrodą. Emocji na pewno nie zabraknie(n)

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Jane próbuje wybadać, na ile Grayson zdaje sobie sprawę z tego, co łączy ją i Deb. Przy okazji prawniczka poznaje pewien mroczny sekret, który może zaprowadzić klientkę kancelarii do więzienia. Skłócony z Owenem brat prosi go o wniesienie pozwu przeciwko nocnemu klubowi. Nie najlepsze relacje rodzinne znowu dają o sobie znać(n)

programme.title: Detektyw Cain
programme.desc: W operze w Marsylii dochodzi do dziwnego zdarzenia - w trakcie przedstawienia "Romeo i Julia" nagle umiera główny tancerz, Cyril Dubois. Istnieje kilku potencjalnych morderców. Jednym z nich jest Grigorij, który po śmierci Cyrila stanie na czele baletu. Podejrzenia padają również na zazdrosną Noémie, do szaleństwa zakochaną w denacie. Detektywi mają też wątpliwości co do innego baletmistrza, Serge Vassara - mógł on obawiać się konkurencji ze strony święcącego triumfy Cyrila. Prowadzący śledztwo Cain nie może być pewien nawet szczerości brata zmarłego, operowego osteopaty, który zna wszystkie mroczne tajemnice artystów. Tancerze swojej sztuce poświęcają ciało i duszę i mają przy tym świadomość, że nikt nie jest w stanie zagwarantować im sukcesu. Kierowani ambicją poddają się żelaznej dyscyplinie, żyją w zamkniętym świecie i wszystkie swoje siły koncentrują na karierze. Artyści są gotowi na wiele, dlatego nawet Cain nie może czuć się bezpiecznie w operze(n)

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Modne stroje, imponujące wnętrza, wykwintne dania i szalona zabawa w towarzystwie gorących rytmów, czyli fascynująca opowieść o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące lub niemal niemożliwe do zrealizowania(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny(n)

programme.title: Bombowe dziewczyny
programme.desc: Zbliża się termin ślubu Kate i Ivana. Niestety uroczyste przygotowania zostają zakłócone przez detektywa Brodiego. Przyszła panna młoda zostaje bowiem wezwana przez na przesłuchanie - chodzi o wyjaśnienie okoliczności śmierci jej ojca. Betty również musi złożyć zeznania. Lorna martwi się o przyjaciółki i stara się za wszelką cenę im pomóc. Jej decyzje odmieniają losy jej bliskich. Wkrótce także Ivan poznaje sytuację swojej narzeczonej i jej prawdziwą tożsamość. Tymczasem Betty zbiera się na odwagę i postanawia dać wyraz swoim uczuciom wobec Kate. Z kolei Clifford składa Gladys propozycję nie do odrzucenia(n)

programme.title: Dobra partia
programme.desc: Obraz był prezentowany między innymi na festiwalu kina niezależnego w Sundance, gdzie ubiegał się o główną nagrodę. Beth (Alison Brie) i jej długoletni partner Andrew (Martin Starr) mają wkrótce stanąć na ślubnym kobiercu. Przyszła panna młoda czyni gorączkowe przygotowania do uroczystości. Jej siostra Sarah (Lizzy Caplan) ma odmienne niż ona poglądy na życie. Kobieta w zupełnie inny sposób podchodzi do relacji z płcią przeciwną. Pragnie przede wszystkim niezależności i swobody, dlatego odrzuca nieoczekiwane oświadczyny swojego chłopaka, Kevina (Geoffrey Arend). Niedługo po rozstaniu w życiu Sarah pojawia się Jonathan (Mark Webber). Para wdaje się w namiętny romans, a uroczy mężczyzna szybko zdobywa jej serce. Niespodziewane uczucie zmusza ją do zastanowienia się nad swoimi wyborami i podjęcia trudnej decyzji(n)

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Historie niezadowolonych z siebie i swojego życia kobiet, które pragną pozytywnej zmiany. Bohaterki programu opowiedzą o swoich problemach, trudnej przeszłości i źródłach obecnej, złej sytuacji. Następnie przejdą niezwykłą metamorfozę pod okiem trenerki rozwoju osobistego Joanny Godeckiej, stylistki i wizażystki Wiganny Papiny oraz fryzjera Andrzeja Frani. Dzięki nim staną się pewne swojej wartości, uporządkują panujący do tej pory w życiu chaos i poczują się piękniejsze. Odmienione stawią czoła codziennym przeciwnościom, z którymi do tej pory nie radziły sobie najlepiej. Ich szczerych i wzruszających zwierzeń wysłucha gospodyni programu Katarzyna Cichopek(n)

programme.title: Muzyczny rytm dnia
programme.desc: Wyjątkowe zestawienie przebojów, które dzięki swojej energii nadadzą widzom odpowiedni rytm dnia. Ta muzyka jest rytmem ich pulsu

programme.title: Muzyczny rytm dnia
programme.desc: Wyjątkowe zestawienie przebojów, które dzięki swojej energii nadadzą widzom odpowiedni rytm dnia. Ta muzyka jest rytmem ich pulsu

programme.title: Hit za hitem
programme.desc: Twórcy programu, jak wskazuje jego nazwa, prezentują widzom tylko największe hity światowych i rodzimych wykonawców. Widzowie usłyszą najsłynniejsze przeboje, grane jeden po drugim

programme.title: Hit za hitem
programme.desc: Twórcy programu, jak wskazuje jego nazwa, prezentują widzom tylko największe hity światowych i rodzimych wykonawców. Widzowie usłyszą najsłynniejsze przeboje, grane jeden po drugim

programme.title: 100 złotych
programme.desc: Zestawienie klipów, które w ciągu ostatnich kilku lat najbardziej namieszały w show-biznesie. Zaproszeni do studia goście komentują zaprezentowane w rankingu utwory. Program jest dynamicznie zmontowany, a widz czasami ma wrażenie, że goście prowadzą ze sobą dialog. Ich wypowiedzi przeplatane są fragmentami piosenek. Klipy są także prezentowane jako tło blueboxowe bądź jako element scenografii

programme.title: The best of...
programme.desc: Największe hity muzyki polskiej i zagranicznej z wybranego roku

programme.title: 24 godziny online.pl
programme.desc: Reporterzy z całej Polski prezentują aktualne wydarzenia z kraju i ze świata. Każdego dnia widzowie otrzymają zestaw informacji, które mają lub mogą mieć wpływ na ich życie. Najważniejszy punkt odniesienia w serwisie stanowi człowiek. Reporterzy skupiają się głównie na tematach, których brakuje obecnie w serwisach informacyjnych. Program przygotowują znani dziennikarze, m.in. Beata Tadla, Joanna Dunikowska, Marek Czyż, Jarosław Kulczycki i Tomasz Sekielski

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny

programme.title: Teraz Ja!
programme.desc: Tomasz Sekielski prezentuje informacje o wydarzeniach, które wywierają realny wpływ na codzienne życie. Wraz z zaproszonymi do studia gośćmi omówi najważniejsze doniesienia z kraju i ze świata. Nie zabraknie także reporterskich relacji czy dziennikarskich prowokacji

programme.title: Party Mix
programme.desc: Weekendowe pasmo muzyczne, w którym jego twórcy zaprezentują starannie wyselekcjonowany zbiór utworów w sam raz na taneczny, imprezowy wieczór. Widzowie usłyszą przeboje, które cieszą się największą popularnością w różnych częściach świata. Nie zabraknie najsłynniejszych hitów artystów polskich i gwiazd z zagranicy

programme.title: Party Mix

programme.title: Jej Szerokość Afrodyta
programme.desc: Jane próbuje wybadać, na ile Grayson zdaje sobie sprawę z tego, co łączy ją i Deb. Przy okazji prawniczka poznaje pewien mroczny sekret, który może zaprowadzić klientkę kancelarii do więzienia. Skłócony z Owenem brat prosi go o wniesienie pozwu przeciwko nocnemu klubowi. Nie najlepsze relacje rodzinne znowu dają o sobie znać(n)

programme.title: Detektyw Cain
programme.desc: W operze w Marsylii dochodzi do dziwnego zdarzenia - w trakcie przedstawienia "Romeo i Julia" nagle umiera główny tancerz, Cyril Dubois. Istnieje kilku potencjalnych morderców. Jednym z nich jest Grigorij, który po śmierci Cyrila stanie na czele baletu. Podejrzenia padają również na zazdrosną Noémie, do szaleństwa zakochaną w denacie. Detektywi mają też wątpliwości co do innego baletmistrza, Serge Vassara - mógł on obawiać się konkurencji ze strony święcącego triumfy Cyrila. Prowadzący śledztwo Cain nie może być pewien nawet szczerości brata zmarłego, operowego osteopaty, który zna wszystkie mroczne tajemnice artystów. Tancerze swojej sztuce poświęcają ciało i duszę i mają przy tym świadomość, że nikt nie jest w stanie zagwarantować im sukcesu. Kierowani ambicją poddają się żelaznej dyscyplinie, żyją w zamkniętym świecie i wszystkie swoje siły koncentrują na karierze. Artyści są gotowi na wiele, dlatego nawet Cain nie może czuć się bezpiecznie w operze(n)

programme.title: Moje szalone włoskie wesele
programme.desc: Modne stroje, imponujące wnętrza, wykwintne dania i szalona zabawa w towarzystwie gorących rytmów, czyli fascynująca opowieść o pełnych przepychu, ekstrawaganckich weselach we Włoszech. W każdym odcinku kamera przygląda się przygotowaniom różnych par do ich wielkiego święta. Okazuje się, że niektórzy zakochani wydają majątek, by tego dnia zaimponować rodzinie lub spełnić swoje najbardziej osobliwe zachcianki. Niektóre pomysły wydają się bardzo zaskakujące lub niemal niemożliwe do zrealizowania(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: Program informacyjny(n)

programme.title: Bombowe dziewczyny
programme.desc: Zbliża się termin ślubu Kate i Ivana. Niestety uroczyste przygotowania zostają zakłócone przez detektywa Brodiego. Przyszła panna młoda zostaje bowiem wezwana przez na przesłuchanie - chodzi o wyjaśnienie okoliczności śmierci jej ojca. Betty również musi złożyć zeznania. Lorna martwi się o przyjaciółki i stara się za wszelką cenę im pomóc. Jej decyzje odmieniają losy jej bliskich. Wkrótce także Ivan poznaje sytuację swojej narzeczonej i jej prawdziwą tożsamość. Tymczasem Betty zbiera się na odwagę i postanawia dać wyraz swoim uczuciom wobec Kate. Z kolei Clifford składa Gladys propozycję nie do odrzucenia(n)

programme.title: Dobra partia
programme.desc: Obraz był prezentowany między innymi na festiwalu kina niezależnego w Sundance, gdzie ubiegał się o główną nagrodę. Beth (Alison Brie) i jej długoletni partner Andrew (Martin Starr) mają wkrótce stanąć na ślubnym kobiercu. Przyszła panna młoda czyni gorączkowe przygotowania do uroczystości. Jej siostra Sarah (Lizzy Caplan) ma odmienne niż ona poglądy na życie. Kobieta w zupełnie inny sposób podchodzi do relacji z płcią przeciwną. Pragnie przede wszystkim niezależności i swobody, dlatego odrzuca nieoczekiwane oświadczyny swojego chłopaka, Kevina (Geoffrey Arend). Niedługo po rozstaniu w życiu Sarah pojawia się Jonathan (Mark Webber). Para wdaje się w namiętny romans, a uroczy mężczyzna szybko zdobywa jej serce. Niespodziewane uczucie zmusza ją do zastanowienia się nad swoimi wyborami i podjęcia trudnej decyzji(n)

programme.title: Nowa Ja!
programme.desc: Historie niezadowolonych z siebie i swojego życia kobiet, które pragną pozytywnej zmiany. Bohaterki programu opowiedzą o swoich problemach, trudnej przeszłości i źródłach obecnej, złej sytuacji. Następnie przejdą niezwykłą metamorfozę pod okiem trenerki rozwoju osobistego Joanny Godeckiej, stylistki i wizażystki Wiganny Papiny oraz fryzjera Andrzeja Frani. Dzięki nim staną się pewne swojej wartości, uporządkują panujący do tej pory w życiu chaos i poczują się piękniejsze. Odmienione stawią czoła codziennym przeciwnościom, z którymi do tej pory nie radziły sobie najlepiej. Ich szczerych i wzruszających zwierzeń wysłucha gospodyni programu Katarzyna Cichopek(n)

programme.title: Twirlywoos
programme.desc: The Twirlywoos are beside a river. They watch a fisherman make his rod longer and longer and longer. The fisherman casts out the line and then settles down for a nap. Chickedy and Chick run along the rod to the very end. Toodloo runs along the rod and jumps to join Chickedy and Chick. This causes the rod to spring up sending them flying! The fisherman wakes to discover a long, long, long fish at the end of his line. The Twirlywoo Screen draws a small line that Chickedy and Chick help make longer.
